name: Anomaly in "Average In Progress to Ready for Review cycle time" where "IssueType" is "Bug"
query:
SELECT "IssueType", AVG(
	(SELECT LAST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to Ready for Review'))))
	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))))
   ) AS "Average In Progress to Ready for Review cycle time" FROM "defaultview-217" WHERE ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME)) >= 2) GROUP BY 1 LIMIT 500
description: Metric "Average In Progress to Ready for Review cycle time" is 7.66% lower than mean where "IssueType" is "Bug"
signalFragment:

	-(SELECT FIRST(end_time) FILTER (
		WHERE (event_name IN ('Change Status to In Progress'))))
   ) AS "Average In Progress to Ready for Review cycle time" FROM "defaultview-217" WHERE ((SELECT COUNT (EVENT_NAME)) >= 2) GROUP BY 1 LIMIT 500

parser_values: ["Change Status to Ready for Review", "Change Status to In Progress", "2", "1", "IssueType", "500"]
